<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve a hierarchy branch by slug"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/hierarchies/{hierarchy_slug}/branches/{branch_slug}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a hierarchy branch by slug

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"hierarchy_slug","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Slug of the hierarchy","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"branch_slug","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Slug of the branch to retrieve","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Hierarchy Branch","content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"example":{"value":{"data":{"_link":{"self":"/api/v1/hierarchies/arbre-1/branches/id_agence"},"slug":"id_agence","title":"id_agence","values":[{"code":"R_2_4","title":"DEFENSE"},{"code":"R_1_4","title":"PARIS"}]}}}}}}},"404":{"description":"Not found","content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"example":{"value":{"status":404,"message":"Not found"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
